solution_line_template: Each turn Barry takes standing on his head lasts for {headstand_duration}+{rest_duration}=<<{headstand_duration}+{rest_duration}={total_turn_duration}>>{total_turn_duration} minutes.
Barry can take {total_minutes_period}/{total_turn_duration}=<<{total_minutes_period}/{total_turn_duration}={number_of_turns}>>{number_of_turns} turns standing on his head over two hours.
